author: jameshe5018
content:
<@199561711278227457> are there any like metrics or benchmarks on some of the beacon api endpoints? was debugging the prysm rest validator , noticing some of these duties calls take a crazy long time to process connected to the http://beacon.holesky.ethpandaops.io:80
I think committee duties is taking like 5-7 seconds I think but I'll investigate a bit more. was just curious if anyone from pandaops took a look at some of these.

author: parithosh
content: <@131476523050860545> are we pushing metrics to our usual setup?

author: parithosh
content:
TLDR of holesky:
The exit queue being so full makes holeksy a bad candidate for consolidation testing (amongst other things). While holesky is stable and can be used for a lot of tests, we need to discuss the location for tests it isnt suitable for. 

I proposed it as a topic on ACD this week: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1346#issuecomment-2715006052

Considering staking pool opinion weighs really highly on this decision, could we ask you all to engage on the topic, share the options, collect opinions and potentially even attend ACD to be included in the decision?

author: skylenet
content: Uhm, we might be, yeah. Check if the nodes have Prometheus running and then they should be shipping metrics.
